Title: Redline
Genre: Animation, Action, Romance, Sci-Fi, Sport, Thriller
Writer: Katsuhito Ishii (original story), Katsuhito Ishii (screenplay), Yoji Enokido (screenplay), Yoshiki Sakurai (screenplay), Alexander Von David (adr script)
Actors: Takuya Kimura, Yû Aoi, Tadanobu Asano, Yoshiyuki Morishita
Plot: A story about the most popular racing event in the galaxy, the Redline, and the various racers who compete in it.
